chapters.title: Chapter 55: Into the Deep
chapters.info: Thera, p. 918 (832)—Name Elayne gives to Rendra for Amathera, the Panarch. She uses it as a disguise, a refugee with no money and no place to stay. Elayne thinks that a little time in poverty will do Amathera some good—she will realize what the lower classes are feeling. See also Aelfdene Casmir Lounault, Amathera.
